content: shades of summer dress - 1 - ~ shades of summer dress ~ this cute and flirty summer dress is knit from top down and is completely seamless the bodice is knit in seed stitch while the rest of the dress is knit in stockinette stitch mostly this dress here is shown in size 3-4t contrast color yarn used is silkience from ella rae and main color is cotton joy #706 formerly distributed by needful yarns and at present can be obtained from diamond yarns distributors the dress measures 17 inches from the underarm sizes available 3-6 months 15-16 6-12 months 17-18 1-2t 19-20 2-3t 21-22 3-4t 22-23 4-5t 23-24 5-6t 24-25 © elena nodel 2009 shades of summer dress - 2 - materials abbreviations contrast yarn 2 2 3 3 3 3 3 balls of dk cotton yarn k=knit about 110 yards per 50g ball p=purl main yarn 1 2 2 3 3 4 5 balls of dk cotton yarn kfb= knit into the front and back of the stitch thus about 140 yards per 50g ball increasing the stitch number by one 3 5 mm circular needles 60 and 80 cm or size to pfkb = purl into the front of the stitch then knit into obtain gauge the back of the stitch 2 sts made out of 1 4 0 mm circular needles 40 or 50 cm or size to m1dr = pick up the loop on the row below the first obtain gauge stitch on the left needle knit it 6 stitch markers a few decorative buttons optional m1dl = pick up the loop 2 row below the first stitch on the right needle and knit it gauge 23 sts per 4 inches skirt and 21 sts per 4 slipm = slip marker from left needle to the right inches bodice please take your time to check your gauge note on gauge and yarn bodice gauge is most important the pattern was designed with cotton yarn in mind i have taken into the account the stretchiness of the cotton thus about 2 inches of negative ease are in the design of the bodice if however you want to knit your project in wool i would recommend going up a size © elena nodel 2009 shades of summer dress - 3 - method round 2 knit and start raglan increases raglan increase round from the beginning of the round kfb knit to 1 stitch before next marker kfb bodice slipm x4 essentially you increase into a stitch before and the bodice is after each stitch marker number of stitches is worked in seed increased by 8 stitch it is knitted in 4 sections with an round 3 purl odd number of round 4 knit and do raglan increases as above stitches in each round 5 purl section next you will start seed stitch and continue with seed stitch raglan increases from the beginning of the round *k1 p1* repeat ** to last stitch k1 round 6 kfb
